publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6116 Angela Constance: Congratulations to Paul de Resta of Force India on F1 Debutâ€”That the Parliament offers its sincere congratulations to Force India driver Paul di Resta from Uphall for his stunning F1 debut at a grand prix weekend in Australia; applauds the 23-year old for driving in place of team-mate Adrian Sutil during first practice and setting the 11th fastest time of one minute and 28.537 seconds; appreciates the remarkable precedent that Mr di Resta has made for Scottish F1 racers, and wishes Mr di Resta and the Force India team continued success in future competitive endeavours.
S3M-6116 Congratulations to Paul de Resta of Force India on F1 Debut (lodged on 9 April 2010) Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Stuart McMillan*
